name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Remove User
title: Propose removing a user
description: Use when a user wants to remove a board member or proposer from the multi-sig. Creates a proposal that needs quorum approval before the user is removed.

inputs.name: User Address
inputs.description: The wallet address of the user to remove from the MultiSig.

label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird

body.en: A board member has signed proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} to remove a user
body.de: Ein Vorstandsmitglied hat Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} zur Entfernung eines Benutzers unterzeichnet
